job_title: CAT Client Assistant Tech in Nashville, TN
pros: Loving what you do makes it easy to love working here. Face to face interactions w/clients to assist forwarding their recovery, w/ a focus on faith and work watching clients reintegrate into a life worth living is a joy.
cons: Must be willing to focus on self care. Compassion fatigue can be draining.
